climbs.name: Craig
climbs.fa: Todd Battey, Todd Gordon, Dave Evans, Tom Burke, Craig Fry, Rob Stahl

content.description: This rather long pitch is mostly sport protected. There is a fixed pin at the start, and maybe a piece two need under a roof, but the rest is bolted.
content.protection: Mostly QDs, and maybe a small or med cam under a roof.
content.location: This is the bolted line that goes up the dark patina face on the largest formation in the area. It is the first crag you come to as you drive in as well. The route faces the freeway, and you can park your car at the start of the route.

climbs.name: The Black Wiener
climbs.fa: Free solo Tom Burke, Tucker Tech, Greg Epperson.  First lead   Todd Gordon and others

content.description: Fun little summit that was originally soloed with bolts added soon after. Great spot for a sunset!
content.location: The obvious dark spire to the east that can be seen from the parking area.
